## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have added XML documentation comments for public APIs
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed any debug code or console logs

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple platforms (if applicable: x64, x86, ARM64)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation comments
- [ ] I have updated CONTRIBUTING.md (if workflow changed)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that no new dependencies were added unnecessarily
- [ ] If dependencies were added, I have verified they are compatible with .NET 9.0
- [ ] I have updated the .csproj file if needed

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR does not introduce breaking changes
- [ ] OR: I have documented all breaking changes in CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] OR: I have updated migration guide (if applicable)
